label: ID column
description: Unique subject identifier variable name.

label: Value column
description: Lab result variable name.

label: Measure column
description: Lab measure variable name

label: Lower Limit of Normal column
description: Lower limit of normal variable name

label: Upper Limit of Normal column
description: Upper limit of normal variable name

label: Study Day column
description: Visit day variable name

label: Visit column
description: Visit variable name

label: Visit Number column
description: Visit number variable name

label: Filters columns
description: An optional list of specifications for filters. Each filter is a nested, named list (containing the filter value column: 'value_col' and associated label: 'label') within the larger list.

label: Group columns
description: An optional list of specifications for grouping columns. Each group column is a nested, named list (containing the group variable column: 'value_col' and associated label: 'label') within the larger list.

label: Alanine Aminotransferase value
description: Value used for Alanine Aminotransferase in the specified measure column

label: Aspartate Aminotransferase value
description: Value used for Aspartate Aminotransferase in the specified measure column

label: Total Bilirubin value
description: Value used for Total Bilirubin in the specified measure column

label: Alkaline Phosphatase value
description: Value used for Alkaline Phosphatase in the specified measure column

label: Baseline column
description: An optional list defining which column represent the baseline visit(s) of the study.

label: Baseline values
description: An optional list defining which values (one or more) represent the baseline visit(s) of the study.

label: Analysis Flag column
description: An optional list defining which column should be used in eDish and mDish analyses.

label: Analysis Flag values
description: An optional list defining which values should be used in eDish and mDish analyses.

label: X axis options
description: Specifies variable options for the x-axis using the key values from measure_values (e.g. 'ALT'). When multiple options are specified, a control allowing the user to interactively change the x variable is shown.

label: Y axis options
description: Specifies variable options for the y-axis using the key values from measure_values (e.g. 'TB'). When multiple options are specified, a control allowing the user to interactively change the y variable is shown.

label: Default Visit Window in Days
description: Default visit window used to highlight eDish points where x and y measures occurred within the specified number of days. Editable by user after render.

label: Show R Ratio Filter?
description: Specifies whether the R Ratio filter should be shown. R ratio is defined as: (ALT value/ULN for ALT) / (ALP value/ULN for ALP).

label: Default R Ratio Cut
description: Default cut point for R Ratio filter. Ignored when r_ratio_filter = FALSE. User can update this setting via the UI when r_ratio_filter = TRUE.

label: Show Chart Title?
description: Specifies whether the title should be drawn above the controls.

label: Warning text
description: Informational text to be displayed near the top of the controls (beneath the title, if any). No warning is displayed if warningText = ''.
default: "Caution: This interactive graphic is not validated. Any clinical recommendations based on this tool should be confirmed using your organizations standard operating procedures."
adam: "Caution: This interactive graphic is not validated. Any clinical recommendations based on this tool should be confirmed using your organizations standard operating procedures."
sdtm: "Caution: This interactive graphic is not validated. Any clinical recommendations based on this tool should be confirmed using your organizations standard operating procedures."
